name: Cycles of Survivle
description:
This game was made for the extra credits game jam #3.

The goal is to survive as long as possible by eating enough food to be able to sleep in your cave. The game is split up in to two diffrent cycles, the day and night cycle and the cycle of seasons.

CONTROLS:

-A+D to move

-Space to jump

- Right mousebutton to eat

- Left mousebutton to grab or put down

- left + right mousebutton to sleep (only when full)
